meta.name: Collect & Process Trip Feedback with Google Sheets and Email Notifications

name: Automated Trip Feedback Collection via Google Sheets

values.fieldLabel: How was your last trip with us ?
Did you like the taste of the food which we provide ?
What place did you enjoy the most?
Was our tour guide polite and helpful?
How would you rate your overall trip experience?

nodes.name: Send Email To That New User

parameters.text:
Please fill out this feedback form:
https://n8n-devops.oneclicksales.xyz/form/trip-feedback
parameters.subject: Feedback

parameters.content: This node triggers the workflow whenever a new row is added to the Google Sheets feedback form.
This node introduces a delay to ensure the data is fully processed before sending notifications, avoiding premature actions.
This node sends an email with feedback form to the new user.
This node appends or updates the trip feedback data in the Google Sheets, maintaining an organized record.
This node iterates over each form submission item to process multiple entries if present, ensuring all data is handled.
This node triggers the workflow when a trip feedback form is submitted, initiating the data processing loop.

main.node: Send Email To That New User
